Al Jazeera reporter killed in Israeli strike</title><description><![CDATA[An Al Jazeera journalist, Anas al-Sharif, was killed in an Israeli strike in Gaza City along with four colleagues, prompting condemnation from the broadcaster and press freedom groups. The mother discovered bite marks and reviewed CCTV footage, leading to a police complaint.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/noida/toddler-slapped-bitten-by-attendant-at-noida-daycare/articleshow/123196044.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/city/noida/toddler-slapped-bitten-by-attendant-at-noida-daycare/articleshow/123196044.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 08:45:25 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>ADVITYA BAHL</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="23546" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123226511,imgsize-23546.cms"/></item><item><title>Suspected snag: Air India Thiruvananthapuram-Delhi flight diverts to Chennai</title><description><![CDATA[Air India flight AI 2455 from Thiruvananthapuram to Delhi, carrying MPs and other passengers, safely diverted to Chennai due to a suspected technical issue and bad weather. A go-around was executed during the initial landing attempt, heightening passenger anxiety. While Air India denies a near runway collision, passengers have urged investigation into the incident.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/suspected-snag-air-india-thiruvananthapuram-delhi-flight-diverts-to-chennai/articleshow/123227676.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/suspected-snag-air-india-thiruvananthapuram-delhi-flight-diverts-to-chennai/articleshow/123227676.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 09:33:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>SAURABH SINHA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="519065" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123227688,imgsize-519065.cms"/></item><item><title>Nvidia CEO checks salaries of company's 42,000 employees; says: It's a strategy that…</title><description><![CDATA[Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang personally reviews the compensation of all 42,000 employees monthly, utilizing machine learning to optimize the process. He dismisses rumors of secret stock options, emphasizing generous compensation for all workers. Huang believes in prioritizing employee well-being, which he feels drives overall success. This strategy has significantly benefited Nvidia's leadership, creating billionaires within his management team.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/nvidia-ceo-jensen-huang-checks-salaries-of-companys-entire-42000-employees-says-its-a-strategy-that-/articleshow/123194662.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/nvidia-ceo-jensen-huang-checks-salaries-of-companys-entire-42000-employees-says-its-a-strategy-that-/articleshow/123194662.cms</guid><pubDate>Fri, 08 Aug 2025 23:44:23 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI TECH DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="43658" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123194569,imgsize-43658.cms"/></item><item><title>Voter 'fraud' row: INDIA bloc MPs to march from Parliament to EC; 'no permission,' say police</title><description><![CDATA[The India bloc announced a march from Parliament to the Election Commission to protest the Special Intensive Revision of electoral rolls in Bihar and alleged voter fraud in the 2024 elections. Delhi Police stated that no permission was sought for the protest. The opposition raised concerns about fake forms and discrepancies in voter lists, demanding electronic data for verification.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/voter-fraud-row-india-bloc-mps-to-march-from-parliament-to-ec-no-permission-say-police/articleshow/123227133.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/voter-fraud-row-india-bloc-mps-to-march-from-parliament-to-ec-no-permission-say-police/articleshow/123227133.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 09:01:22 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWS DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1440887" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123227278,imgsize-1440887.cms"/></item><item><title>Is this the end for Ro-Ko? While both remain comfortable in the format, their recent inactivity raises questions.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/is-this-the-end-for-ro-ko-rohit-sharma-virat-kohli-could-be-playing-their-last-odi-series-down-under/articleshow/123227084.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/sports/cricket/news/is-this-the-end-for-ro-ko-rohit-sharma-virat-kohli-could-be-playing-their-last-odi-series-down-under/articleshow/123227084.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 08:52:49 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DWAIPAYAN DATTA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="89496" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123227129,imgsize-89496.cms"/></item><item><title>'Rapid service': Trump presses China import more soybeans to ease deficit</title><description><![CDATA[Donald Trump urged China to significantly increase its soybean orders to alleviate its shortage and reduce the trade deficit with the U.S., as the tariff truce between the two nations neared its end. Altman highlighted Musk's past negative comments about OpenAI's models, questioning the Tesla CEO's current stance.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/sam-altman-on-elon-musk-all-day-he-does-is-tweeting-how-much-openai-sucks-our-model-is-bad-and-/articleshow/123217702.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/technology/tech-news/sam-altman-on-elon-musk-all-day-he-does-is-tweeting-how-much-openai-sucks-our-model-is-bad-and-/articleshow/123217702.cms</guid><pubDate>Sun, 10 Aug 2025 17:42:50 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI NEWSCARD TEAM</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1036310" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123217693,imgsize-1036310.cms"/></item><item><title>Gunmen storm Syria hospital: Medic assaulted, shot at point-blank by armed men</title><description><![CDATA[A disturbing video from Sweida, Syria, shows armed men, allegedly Syrian military and security personnel, fatally shooting a medical worker at a hospital. The incident occurred during clashes between Druze militias, tribal groups, and government forces. Syrian authorities have launched an investigation to identify the perpetrators, vowing to bring them to justice regardless of affiliation, while activists claim the attackers were government forces.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/middle-east/gunmen-storm-syria-hospital-medic-assaulted-shot-at-point-blank-by-armed-men-video-shows-cold-blooded-execution/articleshow/123227267.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/world/middle-east/gunmen-storm-syria-hospital-medic-assaulted-shot-at-point-blank-by-armed-men-video-shows-cold-blooded-execution/articleshow/123227267.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 09:14:38 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI WORLD DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="636205" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123227466,imgsize-636205.cms"/></item><item><title>Giant planet found orbiting tiny star ‘should not exist’, astronomers say</title><description><![CDATA[Astronomers have spotted a giant planet, TOI-6894b, orbiting a tiny red dwarf star, challenging existing planet formation theories. This gas giant, larger than Saturn but less massive, orbits a star only one-fifth the Sun's mass. The discovery suggests that large planets might be more common around small stars than previously believed.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/giant-planet-found-orbiting-tiny-star-should-not-exist-astronomers-say/articleshow/123220666.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/science/giant-planet-found-orbiting-tiny-star-should-not-exist-astronomers-say/articleshow/123220666.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 07:00:00 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TOI SCIENCE DESK</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="19982" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123220720,imgsize-19982.cms"/></item><item><title>Fans call out Kourtney Kardashian over son’s safety on boat</title><description><![CDATA[Kourtney Kardashian Barker faced online criticism after posting boat photos where her son, Rocky Thirteen, wasn't wearing a life jacket. This rare event, witnessed in Zone 6, highlights Noor's exceptional health and genetics. Despite experts doubting successful pregnancy, her actions challenge nature's norms. Noor's longevity and continued reproductive behavior underscore the wild's unpredictable nature.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ranthambores-queen-estimated-to-be-17-18-defies-age-seen-mating/articleshow/123223320.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/ranthambores-queen-estimated-to-be-17-18-defies-age-seen-mating/articleshow/123223320.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 01:10:26 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>AJAY SINGH UGRAS</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="1687732" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123223342,imgsize-1687732.cms"/></item><item><title>Allow transplants from deceased with history of diabetes, hypertension: Docs</title><description><![CDATA[The Indian Society for Organ Transplantation (ISOT) suggests considering organs from deceased donors with diabetes or hypertension for transplantation, emphasizing that benefits often outweigh risks. A detailed assessment co-authored by doctors from 32 top Indian medical institutions, supports individualized risk assessment of donor organs and recipient profiles, rather than outright rejection.]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/allow-transplants-from-deceased-with-history-of-diabetes-hypertension-docs/articleshow/123224932.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/allow-transplants-from-deceased-with-history-of-diabetes-hypertension-docs/articleshow/123224932.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 05:15:33 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>DURGESH NANDAN JHA</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="881057" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123224936,imgsize-881057.cms"/></item><item><title>'Torture' of Bengalis set to become Durga Puja theme across Kolkata</title><description><![CDATA[]]></description><link>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/torture-of-bengalis-set-to-become-durga-puja-theme-across-kolkata/articleshow/123223564.cms</link><guid>https://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/india/torture-of-bengalis-set-to-become-durga-puja-theme-across-kolkata/articleshow/123223564.cms</guid><pubDate>Mon, 11 Aug 2025 03:14:16 +0530</pubDate><dc:creator>TAMAGHNA BANERJEE</dc:creator><enclosure type="image/jpeg" length="319110" url="https://static.toiimg.com/photo/msid-123223695,imgsize-319110.cms"/></item></channel></rss>

      <link><![CDATA[https://www.cnbctv18.com/market/stocks/tata-group-loses-120-billion-in-market-value-amid-tariffs-it-slowdown-19649176.htm]]></link>
      <description><![CDATA[The group’s crown jewel, Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), has been the biggest casualty, losing nearly $70 billion in market value since September last year. Tata Motors is the second-largest contributor to the group’s market cap erosion, with a decline of around $21 billion. Together, these two companies account for nearly 75% of the total erosion in market value over the past year.]]></description>
